explains: v. 贪求，觊觎；<正式>贪求，觊觎

sentences.en: Many of us are lacking in the strength we so covet.
sentences.cn: 我们中间有许多人缺乏这种安静的力量。

sentences.en: I briefly covet something, and then the urge passes.
sentences.cn: 我会短暂地渴望一件东西，然后这种购买欲就消失了。

sentences.en: "They each covet the other person's life," says Reynolds.
sentences.cn: “他们都觊觎对方的生活。”雷诺兹说。
